name: The Punic Wars
summary: Continuing on the traditions of the original, award-winning Celtic Kings: Rage of War title, The Punic Wars (aka Nemesis of the Roman Empire) explores the three Punic wars fought by Rome and Carthage between 264 BC and 146 BC and includes the famous campaigns of Hannibal and Scipio Africanus. This game introduces new nations, units, upgrades, and strategies while preserving the fresh and unique gameplay of its highly acclaimed predecessor.
